'''1.2.6.1''' is a hotfix to {{el|be}} released only for Android on December 7, 2017.<ref>https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MCPE/fixforversion/16504</ref>

== Fixes ==

'''Crashes/Performance'''
* Fixed android specific crashes.<ref>{{tweet|HelenAngel|939305376750690304|Literally just fixed Android specific crashes|December 9, 2017}}</ref>
'''General'''
* {{bug|MCPE-27409}} – Certain numbers are censored like swear words
* {{bug|MCPE-29434}}, {{bug|MCPE-29499}}, {{bug|MCPE-29428}}, {{bug|MCPE-29457}}, {{bug|MCPE-29495}} – Chat filter with hashtags
'''Graphics/Audio'''
* {{bug|MCPE-17100}} – Eating sounds/particles are missing when feeding sheep, pigs, chickens, ocelots, wolves, and rabbits.
